prompts: Create a unique ice-type Pokemon inspired by a snow crab with icy blue features.
Show me a fighting-type Pokemon that resembles a snow-covered crab, ready for battle.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines elements of ice and fighting types with a crustacean design.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the toughness of a crab and the chill of winter.
Design a snow-themed Pokemon with claws, emphasizing its icy environments and combative nature.
Give me a legendary creature that looks like a crab, but with frosty accents and martial prowess.
Make a fierce fighting-type Pokemon that resembles a crab, complete with ice-like armor.

distinctive_features: Blue accents on limbs and claws
Yellow horn-like protrusion on the head
